creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Full length view of a man naked from the waist up; he sits in a chair facing forward while he cuts his own hair; the words "Haircut" inscribed, UC; predominant colors: blue, grey and yellow
medium: Lithographs with hand-coloring on hand-made paper in linen portfolio box
title: Study for "Haircut", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
